DOC.brief_title: Efficacy , Safety , Tolerability Gefitinib 1st Line Caucasian Patients With EGFR Mutation Positive Advanced NSCLC
DOC.detailed_description: An Open Label , Multicentre , Single Arm Study Characterise Efficacy , Safety Tolerability Gefitinib 250 mg ( IRESSA™ ) First line Treatment Caucasian Patients , Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor ( EGFR ) Mutation Positive Locally Advanced Metastatic Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.criteria: Locally advanced metastatic nonsmall cell lung cancer ( i.e . cancer spread start ) EGFR mutation positive Caucasian female male patient age 18 year Measurable disease , i.e . least one lesion , previously irradiate , ≥ 10 mm long diameter ( ≥ 15 mm short axis lymph node ) Prior adjuvant chemotherapy systemic anticancer treatment le 6 month , palliative radiotherapy le 4 week prior start study treatment . Brain metastases spinal cord compression , unless treat stable without steroid Any clinically significant illness , jeopardize patient ' safety participation study .
